VkBaseOutStructure.summary: Base structure for a read-only pointer chain.
VkBaseOutStructure.SType.summary: The structure type of the structure being iterated through.
VkBaseOutStructure.Next.summary: <see langword="null"/> or a pointer to the next structure in a structure chain.
VkBaseInStructure.summary: Base structure for a read-only pointer chain.
VkBaseInStructure.SType.summary: The structure type of the structure being iterated through.
VkBaseInStructure.Next.summary: <see langword="null"/> or a pointer to the next structure in a structure chain.
VkViewport.X.summary: The x position of the upper left corner.
VkViewport.Y.summary: The y position of the upper left corner.
VkViewport.MinDepth.summary: The min depth of the viewport.
VkViewport.MaxDepth.summary: The max depth of the viewport.
VkRect2D.Offset.summary: A <see cref="VkOffset2D"/> specifying the rectangle offset.
VkRect2D.Extent.summary: A <see cref="VkExtent2D"/> specifying the rectangle extent.
VkClearRect.Rect.summary: The two-dimensional region to be cleared.
VkClearRect.BaseArrayLayer.summary: The first layer to be cleared.
VkClearRect.LayerCount.summary: The number of layers to clear.
VkComponentMapping.summary: Structure specifying a color component mapping.
VkComponentMapping.R.summary: A <see cref="VkComponentSwizzle"/> specifying the component value placed in the R component of the output vector.
VkComponentMapping.G.summary: A <see cref="VkComponentSwizzle"/> specifying the component value placed in the G component of the output vector.
VkComponentMapping.B.summary: A <see cref="VkComponentSwizzle"/> specifying the component value placed in the B component of the output vector.
VkComponentMapping.A.summary: A <see cref="VkComponentSwizzle"/> specifying the component value placed in the A component of the output vector.
VkPhysicalDeviceProperties.ApiVersion.su: The version of Vulkan supported by the device.
VkPhysicalDeviceProperties.DriverVersion: The vendor-specified version of the driver.
VkPhysicalDeviceProperties.VendorID.summ: A unique identifier for the vendor of the physical device.
VkPhysicalDeviceProperties.DeviceID.summ: A unique identifier for the physical device among devices available from the vendor.
VkPhysicalDeviceProperties.DeviceType.su: A <see cref="VkPhysicalDeviceType"/> specifying the type of device.
VkPhysicalDeviceProperties.DeviceName.su: An array of <see cref="VK.MaxPhysicalDeviceNameSize"/> <see langword="byte"/>s containing a null-terminated UTF-8 string which is the name of the device.
VkPhysicalDeviceProperties.PipelineCache: An array of <see cref="VK.UuidSize"/> <see langword="byte"/> values representing a universally unique identifier for the device.
VkPhysicalDeviceProperties.Limits.summar: The <see cref="VkPhysicalDeviceLimits"/> structure specifying device-specific limits of the physical device.
VkPhysicalDeviceProperties.SparsePropert: The <see cref="VkPhysicalDeviceSparseProperties"/> structure specifying various sparse related properties of the physical device.
VkExtensionProperties.ExtensionName.summ: An array of <see cref="VK.MaxExtensionNameSize"/> <see langword="byte"/>s containing a null-terminated UTF-8 string which is the name of the extension.
VkExtensionProperties.SpecVersion.summar: The version of this extension. It is an integer, incremented with backward compatible changes.
VkLayerProperties.LayerName.summary: An array of <see cref="VK.MaxExtensionNameSize"/> <see langword="byte"/>s containing a null-terminated UTF-8 string which is the name of the layer.
VkLayerProperties.SpecVersion.summary: The Vulkan version the layer was written to.
The version of this layer. It is an integer, increasing with backward compatible changes.
VkLayerProperties.Description.summary: An array of <see cref="VK.MaxDescriptionSize"/> <see langword="byte"/>s containing a null-terminated UTF-8 string which provides additional details that can be used by the application to identify the layer.
VkApplicationInfo.Next.summary: <see langword="null"/> or a pointer to a structure extending this structure.
VkApplicationInfo.ApplicationName.summar: <see langword="null"/> or is a pointer to a null-terminated UTF-8 string containing the name of the application.
VkApplicationInfo.ApplicationVersion.sum: An unsigned integer variable containing the developer-supplied version number of the application.
VkApplicationInfo.EngineName.summary: <see langword="null"/> or is a pointer to a null-terminated UTF-8 string containing the name of the engine (if any) used to create the application.
VkApplicationInfo.EngineVersion.summary: An unsigned integer variable containing the developer-supplied version number of the engine used to create the application.
VkApplicationInfo.ApiVersion.summary: The highest version of Vulkan that the application is designed to use.
VkAllocationCallbacks.summary: Structure containing callback function pointers for memory allocation.
VkAllocationCallbacks.UserData.summary: A value to be interpreted by the implementation of the callbacks. When any of the callbacks in <see cref="VkAllocationCallbacks"/> are called, the Vulkan implementation will pass this value as the first parameter to the callback. This value can vary each time an allocator is passed into a command, even when the same object takes an allocator in multiple commands.
VkAllocationCallbacks.Allocation.summary: A pointer to an application-defined memory allocation function.
VkAllocationCallbacks.Reallocation.summa: A pointer to an application-defined memory reallocation function.
VkAllocationCallbacks.Free.summary: A pointer to an application-defined memory free function.
VkAllocationCallbacks.InternalAllocation: A pointer to an application-defined function that is called by the implementation when the implementation makes internal allocations.
VkAllocationCallbacks.InternalFree.summa: A pointer to an application-defined function that is called by the implementation when the implementation frees internal allocations.
VkDeviceQueueCreateInfo.summary: Structure specifying parameters of a newly created device queue.
VkDeviceQueueCreateInfo.Next.summary: <see langword="null"/> or a pointer to a structure extending this structure.
VkDeviceQueueCreateInfo.Flags.summary: A bitmask indicating behavior of the queues.
VkDeviceQueueCreateInfo.QueueFamilyIndex: An unsigned integer indicating the index of the queue family in which to create the queues on this device.
VkDeviceQueueCreateInfo.QueueCount.summa: An unsigned integer specifying the number of queues to create in the queue family indicated by <see cref="QueueFamilyIndex"/>, and with the behavior specified by <see cref="Flags"/>.
A pointer to an array of <see cref="QueueCount"/> normalized floating point values, specifying priorities of work that will be submitted to each created queue.
VkDeviceCreateInfo.summary: Structure specifying parameters of a newly created device.
VkDeviceCreateInfo.Next.summary: <see langword="null"/> or a pointer to a structure extending this structure.
The unsigned integer size of the <see cref="QueueCreateInfos"/> array.
VkDeviceCreateInfo.QueueCreateInfos.summ: A pointer to an array of <see cref="VkDeviceQueueCreateInfo"/> structures describing the queues that are requested to be created along with the logical device.
VkDeviceCreateInfo.EnabledExtensionCount: The number of device extensions to enable.
VkDeviceCreateInfo.EnabledExtensionNames: A pointer to an array of <see cref="EnabledExtensionCount"/> null-terminated UTF-8 strings containing the names of extensions to enable for the created device.
VkDeviceCreateInfo.EnabledFeatures.summa: <see langword="null"/> or a pointer to a <see cref="VkPhysicalDeviceFeatures"/> structure containing boolean indicators of all the features to be enabled.
VkInstanceCreateInfo.summary: Structure specifying parameters of a newly created instance.
VkInstanceCreateInfo.Next.summary: <see langword="null"/> or a pointer to a structure extending this structure.
VkInstanceCreateInfo.Flags.summary: A bitmask of <see cref="VkInstanceCreateFlags"/> indicating the behavior of the instance.
VkInstanceCreateInfo.ApplicationInfo.sum: <see langword="null"/> or a pointer to a <see cref="VkApplicationInfo"/> structure. If not <see langword="null"/>, this information helps implementations recognize behavior inherent to classes of applications.
VkInstanceCreateInfo.EnabledLayerCount.s: The number of global layers to enable.
VkInstanceCreateInfo.EnabledLayerNames.s: A pointer to an array of <see cref="EnabledLayerCount"/> null-terminated UTF-8 strings containing the names of layers to enable for the created instance. The layers are loaded in the order they are listed in this array, with the first array element being the closest to the application, and the last array element being the closest to the driver.
VkInstanceCreateInfo.EnabledExtensionCou: The number of global extensions to enable.
VkInstanceCreateInfo.EnabledExtensionNam: A pointer to an array of <see cref="EnabledExtensionCount"/> null-terminated UTF-8 strings containing the names of extensions to enable.
VkQueueFamilyProperties.summary: Structure providing information about a queue family.
VkQueueFamilyProperties.QueueFlags.summa: A bitmask of <see cref="VkQueueFlags "/> indicating capabilities of the queues in this queue family.
VkQueueFamilyProperties.QueueCount.summa: The unsigned integer count of queues in this queue family. Each queue family must support at least one queue.
VkQueueFamilyProperties.TimestampValidBi: The unsigned integer count of meaningful bits in the timestamps written via <see cref="VK.CommandWriteTimestamp2"/> or <see cref="VK.CommandWriteTimestamp"/>. The valid range for the count is 36..64 bits, or a value of 0, indicating no support for timestamps. Bits outside the valid range are guaranteed to be zeros.
VkQueueFamilyProperties.MinImageTransfer: The minimum granularity supported for image transfer operations on the queues in this queue family.
VkPhysicalDeviceMemoryProperties.summary: Structure specifying physical device memory properties.
VkPhysicalDeviceMemoryProperties.MemoryT: The number of valid elements in the MemoryTypes array.
